page_content:
We have identified the following policies relevant to this indicator

- [National Youth Policy (NYP, 2010)](http://ir.parliament.gh/bitstream/handle/123456789/564/GHANA%20YOUTH%20POLICY.pdf?sequence=1&isAllowed=y) prepared to serve as a framework to facilitate and accelerate youth development.

- [National Employment Policy (NEP, 2015)](https://www.ilo.org/wcmsp5/groups/public/---africa/---ro-abidjan/---ilo-abuja/documents/publication/wcms_373458.pdf) - The overall objective of the NEP is to adopt an inter-sectoral and integrated approach toward achieving full, decent, productive and freely chosen employment for all Ghanaians who are able and willing to work, thereby improving the living conditions within the framework of equity, security and dignity.
